snippet.title: Minecraft PSP 4.0 Nether Update ▶ Public Beta Tester ▶ Official Release Trailer ▶ RegenStudio™
snippet.description:
#psp #minecraft #development #regenstudio #c++
Minecraft PSP 4.0 Nether Update ▶ Public Beta Tester ▶ Official Release Trailer ▶ RegenStudio™

▶ MINECRAFT PSP 4.0 CHANGELOG:
• Portal system
• New dimension: The Nether
• Fortress structures (Status: Alpha)
• Hell generation (Status: Alpha)
• Hell ambient music
• New blocks (hell)
• New items (hell)
• New crafting recipes (hell)
• New mob, the zombie pig
• Improved skeleton model
• Camera movement
• New and improved on-screen animations
• New world generator (Status: no perlin 3D)
• Perlin 3D (Not in this version)
• Cliff generation (Not in this version)
• Shield (Status: beta)
• Code optimization (15%)
• New menu, with 3D panorama
• Better structure generation (Not in this version)
• Improved fov without distortions of objects in hand
• Nerfed spider
• Dynamic fov when running
• Crouching fixed
• Visual bugs fixed and improved
• Sprint improved
• Bow improved (Status: beta)
• Cloud optimization

▶ Important Notes :
• Compatible with 2000/3000

Website: https://www.regenstudio.net
Support us:  https://www.patreon.com/regenstudio
Discord:  https://discord.gg/7WBeZnp
Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/wandemberg_armijos/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@regenstudio

• Disclaimer: it's just a Concept (Fan-Made) Video to show the power of C++

Video made with love :)
Special Thanks To: @alexdev2306
